items.content_html:
Ok - officially switched over my luciendupont.com domain name to this micro.blog instance. I’m loving the speed and features of micro.blog. And I’m really enjoying paying for something that a small team has built over the years :)

I urge you to check it out if you haven’t.
items.content_text:
Ok - officially switched over my [luciendupont.com](https://luciendupont.com/) domain name to this micro.blog instance. I'm loving the speed and features of [micro.blog](http://micro.blog/). And I'm _really_ enjoying paying for something that a small team has built over the years :) 

I urge you to check it out if you haven't.

items.content_html:

items.content_html:
My grand plan of cleaning up a lot of code at work during this ‘down’ week has been thwarted by my cough/cold annoyance.. middle of the night amazon order of some drugs I hope to help.

I took the day off so I don’t feel gulty taking a 2 hour nap again.
